sentences.en: Fearlessly, he led the troops into combat.
sentences.cn: 他勇敢地带领军队投入战斗.

sentences.en: Fearlessly, Jim laced into his attackers, and soon they all lay unconscious on the ground.
sentences.cn: 吉姆无畏地向袭击他的人还击, 不久他们全都躺在地上失去了知觉.

sentences.en: Fearlessly, Tom lashed into the robbers, who soon ran away.
sentences.cn: 汤姆勇猛无畏地痛打抢劫犯, 很快就把他们打跑了.

sentences.en: He fearlessly lammed into his attackers, and soon they all fled away.
sentences.cn: 他勇猛无畏地痛打袭击者, 很快他们都逃跑了.

sentences.en: He gazed fearlessly at the gunman.
sentences.cn: 他毫不畏惧地注视着那枪手。

sentences.en: He rushed into the midst of the hooligans and laid about him fearlessly.
sentences.cn: 他冲到那群恶棍中间,毫无畏惧地向四面八方乱打.

sentences.en: He seemed to spearhead every important city so fearlessly and successfully.
sentences.cn: 每次进攻重要城市,他似乎都以大无畏的精神充当先锋,而且攻无不克,战无不胜.

sentences.en: He used color fearlessly--they were part of his stories, and an integral part of models' makeup, which was often key in completing the worlds McQueen envisioned.
sentences.cn: 他大胆地用着用着色彩——这是他的故事的组成部分，也是模特不可分割的组成部分，而这常是麦昆预想的世界的关键组成部分。

sentences.en: Her commanding dark eyes regarded the world indifferently and fearlessly.
sentences.cn: 她那能左右一切的黑眼睛冷淡而无畏地注视着人世间.

sentences.en: His parents often encourage him to fling out the gaunlet fearlessly.
sentences.cn: 他父母经常鼓励他勇敢地挑战.

sentences.en: His perseverance inspires many people, including me, to face whatever difficulties fearlessly.
sentences.cn: 他的毅力激励了许多人无惧地面对任何困难, 包括我.

sentences.en: I love color and use it fearlessly.
sentences.cn: 我爱色彩并肆无忌惮地使用它.

sentences.en: In a city where flattery was the daily currency of conversation , Jill fearlessly spoke her mind.
sentences.cn: 在充满恭维话的社交圈子里, 吉尔无所畏惧地直说心里话.

sentences.en: She fearlessly surrendered her bitter spirit unto purgatory.
sentences.cn: 她无惧地把她的灵魂交给了魔鬼.

sentences.en: They strutted fearlessly about with their lustrous eyes flashing defiance.
sentences.cn: 他们昂首阔步,无畏地走着,发亮的眼睛闪着挑战的光芒.

sentences.en: Will cry from now on, she will stand, fearlessly facing hers destiny.
sentences.cn: 从现在起会哭, 她会站, 无所畏惧地面对她的命运.
